ISSUE.TITLE: The switch button overlaps the text in some cases
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 Steps to reproduce the problem: Pre-Conditions: Login to admin panel as admin Downloaded and installed Polish language packgages Reproduction steps: 1. Choose Polish language 2. For example Go to Settings -> General settings 3. Click button Advanced in Polish “Zaawansowany” in the scope settings area Actual result: After uploading the pl language packages, the button overlaps the text. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/63049254/83124707-d67a3480-a0d6-11ea-81c5-31376e58a050.png) Expected result: Correct display button and text. Test Environment: Browser: Chrome Version: 81.0.4044.138 (64-bit) Device: Notebook - Lenovo ThinkPad T480 Also see related issue with solution at https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/issues/4772
